main.name: Shavar Anson
main.contactmessage: Interested in Freelance work for your small business / company? Please visit my business site.

education.description: While at Penn State, I studied Business Administration as a major, and minored in Information Science Technologies. These majors combine a mix of learning best business practices for the real world, along with intermediate programming syntax and concepts.

education.school: Creative & Performing Arts High School of Philadelphia
education.description: During my time, I majored in vocal music, and minored in visual arts. This allowed me to learn graphic design, and work with many different programs within Adobe Suite, such as Photoshop and Illustration.

work.title: Web Developer/Designer
work.description: After doing a few websites for friends and family, in late 2019 I decided to officially launch a personal business site. My goal is to help small businesses locally, become more visible via social media, and proper marketing.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: During my time at XDS, I learned about and built a few projects for major Pharmaceutical companies such as NovenCare, MC2, ArcusBio and more. I adapted to working within a small team-based, agile enviornment.

work.title: Administrative Assistant Officer
work.description: I supported our screening workforce, primarily in administrative duties. I was chosen to participate in the Lean Six Sigma Business training, in order to create a new streamline process for our Logistics team. In the end, we managed to reduce the waste of our consumable items by 18%. I worked directly with our Senior Leadership team, and Headquarters on a weekly basis in order to achieve our end result.

work.title: Social Media editor/Web Developer
work.description: During my time at Penn State, I volunteered my services to my local church. I assisted in designing a simple static webpage for our location, to help the location gain exposure due to them being relatively new. I also served as the Audio/Video tech during Sunday services, and was responsible for recording each service across different medias simultaneously. I was also responsible for the Church's Facebook page and served as a Content editor.

projects.title: Hairtoyou Extensions
projects.category: A very small shopify site I put together for a client. She wanted to be able to book clients outside of social media.

projects.title: T. Shanel Beauty
projects.category: Shopify powered site I put together for a client. Her main concern was the site being mobile friendly.

projects.title: HTML E-Mail
projects.category: Sample campaign e-mail I put together. Great for advertising/promotions!

projects.title: COVID-tracker
projects.category: A responsive React application, that fetches data from an API to generate COVID statistics, selectable by country

projects.title: Landing Page
projects.category: A nice landing page, great for a digital agency/marketing company, to demo a service.

projects.title: E39 tribute
projects.category: A tribute page, made for one of my favorite vehicles, the BMW E39 M5.
